Package design.aeonic.nifty.api.aspect

Interface Aspects

public interface Aspects

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Aspects
    INSTANCE
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> Aspect<T>
    getAspect(AspectType<T> type, net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity entity)
    Gets an aspect of the given type from the given entity, or an empty aspect if it doesn't have one.
    <T> Aspect<T>
    getAspect(AspectType<T> type, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack)
    Gets an aspect of the given type from the given itemstack, or an empty aspect if it doesn't have one.
    <T> Aspect<T>
    getAspect(AspectType<T> type, net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
    Gets an aspect of the given type from the block at the given position, or an empty aspect if the provider doesn't have one (or if it can't be accessed from the given side).
    <T> AspectType<T>
    getAspectType(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation key)
    Returns an aspect type with the given key.
    void
    onAspectRegistered(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation key, Consumer<AspectType<?>> consumer)
    Runs a given consumer when an aspect type is registered with the given key.
    <T> void
    registerAspectType(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation key, AspectType<T> type)
    Registers the given aspect type.

  • Field Details

    • INSTANCE

      static final Aspects INSTANCE

  • Method Details

    • getAspect

      <T> Aspect<T> getAspect(AspectType<T> type, net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
      Gets an aspect of the given type from the block at the given position, or an empty aspect if the provider doesn't have one (or if it can't be accessed from the given side).

    • getAspect

      <T> Aspect<T> getAspect(AspectType<T> type, net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity entity)
      Gets an aspect of the given type from the given entity, or an empty aspect if it doesn't have one.

    • getAspect

      <T> Aspect<T> getAspect(AspectType<T> type, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack)
      Gets an aspect of the given type from the given itemstack, or an empty aspect if it doesn't have one.

    • registerAspectType

      <T> void registerAspectType(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation key, AspectType<T> type)
      Registers the given aspect type. On Forge, this also registers a capability for the given type if one doesn't already exist.

    • getAspectType

      @Nonnull <T> AspectType<T> getAspectType(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation key)
      Returns an aspect type with the given key. If one hasn't been registered, returns a dummy empty aspect type.

    • onAspectRegistered

      void onAspectRegistered(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation key, Consumer<AspectType<?>> consumer)
      Runs a given consumer when an aspect type is registered with the given key. If said aspect type is already registered, runs the consumer immediately.
